hero.title: AI That Finally Works Like a Team
hero.tagline: Digital Avatar × Smart Orchestration × Enterprise Governance
hero.description: TeGo-OS uses enterprise digital avatars as the core carrier, integrating smart orchestration engines, task permission governance, and unified MCP management to help enterprises upgrade organizational knowledge into a 24×7 online, continuously evolving digital workforce — all under secure, controlled governance.

bullets.dualAvatar: Dual Avatar System: Personal avatars for individual productivity, organizational avatars for enterprise-wide collaboration
bullets.orchestration: Orchestration as Productivity: A2A / Chat / Form / Webhook multi-trigger support
bullets.governance: Enterprise Governance: Visibility, authorization, audit, guardrails, approval — full-chain control
bullets.mcp: Zero-Invasion MCP Access: No modification, no deployment — one-click API conversion

hero.imgAlt: TeGo-OS Enterprise Digital Avatar & AI Super Team Platform

productSuite.title: TeGo Product Suite
productSuite.subtitle: One-stop AI collaboration solution covering desktop, browser, and Office for all scenarios

desktop.title: TeGo Desktop
desktop.description: Native desktop client with instant startup and offline capability. Local-first privacy protection with file operations and shell command support.

web.title: TeGo Web
web.description: No installation required, use directly in browser. Access your AI Super Team anytime, anywhere with seamless cross-device collaboration.

office.title: TeGo Office
office.description: AI works directly in Excel and Word. No app switching needed - intelligent data analysis, report generation, and contract review.

capabilities.title: Core Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Empower AI with enhanced interaction and extensibility

a2ui.title: A2UI Dynamic Interface
a2ui.description: AI no longer just outputs text, but generates interactive interfaces directly. Charts, forms, buttons - what you see is what you get.

skills.title: Agent Skills Extension
skills.description: Extend AI capabilities like installing apps. Standardized skill format, cross-platform compatible, unlimited extensibility.

whyTego.title: Why Choose TeGo
whyTego.subtitle: From agent silos to AI Super Team, enabling agents to collaborate like real teams

collaboration.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration
collaboration.description: Break down AI tool barriers, enabling multiple agents to think autonomously, share information, and make decisions together like a real team.

efficiency.title: Concurrent Execution
efficiency.description: Based on DAG scheduling engine, automatically analyze task dependencies, execute parallel tasks simultaneously, 2-5x efficiency improvement.

intelligence.title: Getting Smarter
intelligence.description: Experience pool continuous learning, successful cases automatically accumulated and reused, new task planning time reduced by 40-60%.

security.title: Secure & Controllable
security.description: Enterprise-grade permission system, complete audit trails, private deployment support, local processing of sensitive data.

footer.text: Serving multiple enterprise clients across finance, manufacturing, retail and more

enterprise.title: Enterprise Internal Collaboration
enterprise.description: Through intelligent planning engine, complex office tasks (travel management, project kickoff, meeting scheduling, administrative approvals, knowledge Q&A) are autonomously decomposed into executable subtasks, orchestrating different business agents (admin agent, calendar agent, HR agent) for concurrent execution, achieving end-to-end business closed loop.

government.title: Government Service System Collaboration
government.description: Meeting government requirements for local deployment, data sovereignty, and full-chain control through highly secure and compliant architecture, unifying scattered government service processes across different departments and systems.

finance.title: Financial Industry System Collaboration
finance.description: Financial applications focus on intelligent investment research assistance, full-process credit risk control, and compliance & AML in three core scenarios, aggregating and processing massive unstructured data to precisely capture market and customer risks.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing System Collaboration
manufacturing.description: The collaboration platform connects demand side (sales orders), planning & scheduling (APS, MRP), and execution side (procurement, production), enabling cross-system information alignment and dynamic adjustment through planning, supplier, and predictive maintenance agent clusters.

stateOwned.title: State-Owned Enterprise Collaboration
stateOwned.description: The platform architecture design fits state-owned enterprise needs perfectly, abstracting AI capabilities into unified services, avoiding redundant investments across business lines, and solving core demands of 'breaking system silos' and 'avoiding duplicate investments'.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Shenzhen Zhama Future Technology Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "we") is committed to protecting your personal privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
introduction.content2: By using our services, you agree to the terms of this privacy policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We may collect the following types of information:

items.title: Personal Identity Information:
items.content: name, email address, phone number, etc.

items.title: Technical Information:
items.content: IP address, browser type, device information, access time, etc.

items.title: Usage Data:
items.content: how you use our services, including pages and features accessed

collection.usageIntro: We use the collected information for:
usageItems: Analyzing usage patterns to improve user experience

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

items.title: Service Providers:
items.content: with trusted third parties who help us operate our business

items.title: Legal Requirements:
items.content: when required by law or to protect our rights

items.title: Business Transfers:
items.content: in the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, modification, or destruction. However, please note that no system is 100% secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.
retention.content2: When your information is no longer needed, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under applicable data protection laws, you may have the following rights:
items: Access information we hold about you
Request deletion of your personal information
Object to processing of your information

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and know that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us through:
items: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District
contact.response: We will endeavor to respond to your inquiry within 30 days.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: Welcome to TeGo platform. By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
acceptance.content2: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the service will be deemed acceptance of the modified terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: TeGo is an enterprise-grade multi-agent autonomous collaboration platform that provides the following services:
service.modification: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any services at any time without prior notice.

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: To use certain services, you need to create an account. You agree to:
promises: Provide accurate and complete registration information
Maintain the accuracy of account information
Protect the security of your account password
Take responsibility for all activities under your account
restrictionItems: Violate any applicable laws or regulations

conduct.title: User Conduct Guidelines
conduct.content: When using our services, you may not engage in the following activities:
prohibited: Infringe on others' intellectual property rights
Interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of services
Attempt unauthorized access to systems or data

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content in the service, including but not limited to text, graphics, interfaces, and code, is protected by intellectual property laws.
ip.userContent: You retain ownership of uploaded content but grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee that the services will:
reasons: Be fully compatible with third-party services
Be completely secure or free from unauthorized access

changes.title: Terms Changes
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified to you via email or service notifications. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the modified terms.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from the use of this service should be resolved through friendly consultation. If consultation fails, they should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through the following methods:
methods: Address: Shenzhen Science and Technology Park, Nanshan District

aboutSection.title: From Agent Silos to AI Super Team
aboutSection.subtitle: Enable AI agents to autonomously collaborate like high-performing teams and automatically complete complex business tasks
aboutSection.description: We are not just integrating AI tools, but enabling multiple agents to think autonomously, collaborate intelligently, and execute concurrently like a real team. Break down barriers between AI tools with unified management, intelligent collaboration, and continuous evolution to truly achieve enterprise AI at scale

vision.title: TeGo vs Traditional AI Platforms - Differentiation
paragraphs: From Silos to Team: Solve agent silo problems, enable true AI collaboration instead of working in isolation
From Serial to Concurrent: DAG concurrent scheduling engine, parallel task execution, 2-5x efficiency improvement
From Tools to Intelligence: Based on LAMP collaboration framework, agents autonomously reason and decide like human teams

features.title: LAMP Intelligent Collaboration Framework
features.description: Think-Speak-Decide three-stage reasoning pipeline, enabling agents to continuously reason, share information, and make collaborative decisions like human teams, improving task success rate by 15-25%

features.title: DAG Concurrent Scheduling Engine
features.description: Automatically analyze task dependencies, execute parallel tasks simultaneously, transform from serial to concurrent, achieve 2-5x efficiency improvement, response speed as low as <100ms

features.title: Experience Pool Continuous Learning
features.description: Vector storage of successful experiences, intelligent retrieval of historical cases, automatic reuse of best strategies for new tasks, reducing planning time by 40-60%, getting smarter over time

features.title: A2A Open Protocol
features.description: Support Agent2Agent standard protocol for seamless integration with third-party agents, expand team capability boundaries, build open enterprise AI ecosystem

footer.suffix: , build an untiring AI team to automatically complete complex business tasks.

typingPhrases: Build an Untiring AI Super Team
Think Autonomously · Collaborate Intelligently · Execute Concurrently
From Agent Silos to Super Teams

featuresSection.title: Four Core Capabilities
featuresSection.subtitle: From task understanding to autonomous execution, building a true AI Super Team

collection.title: Intelligent Task Decomposition · Understand Intent & Auto Plan
collection.description: Understand high-level business objectives, automatically decompose into executable subtasks, intelligently match suitable agent team members. Support intent understanding, task decomposition, dependency analysis, and execution plan generation, transforming complex tasks into clear execution steps.

analysis.title: Concurrent Intelligent Scheduling · 2-5x Efficiency Boost
analysis.description: DAG (Directed Acyclic Graph) task scheduling engine automatically analyzes task dependencies, launches independent tasks in parallel, dynamically adjusts concurrency, and isolates exceptions for stability. Transform from serial execution to concurrent scheduling, dramatically reducing task completion time.

organization.title: Team Collaboration Framework · LAMP Intelligence
organization.description: Based on cutting-edge academic research LAMP framework, implements Think (continuous reasoning analysis), Speak (agent communication sharing), Decide (collaborative decision fusion). Enable AI agents to share information, reason collaboratively, and make decisions together like human teams.

gateway.title: Continuous Learning Evolution · Getting Smarter Over Time
gateway.description: Vector storage of historical successful experiences, intelligent retrieval of similar cases, automatic reuse of best strategies. Failed cases serve as counter-examples to avoid repeating mistakes. New task planning time reduced by 40-60%. Experience accumulation enables AI team continuous evolution, achieving 95%+ task success rate.

taskManagement.title: Full-Process Visual Tracking
taskManagement.description: DAG view displays task dependencies, timeline view tracks execution progress, reasoning view presents agent analysis process, communication view monitors team collaboration messages. Fully observable, traceable, and auditable.

habitTracking.title: Dynamic Replanning Capability
habitTracking.description: Automatically identify 7 types of execution anomalies, analyze 4 trend directions to predict task trajectory. Auto-trigger plan adjustment when severe anomalies detected, ensuring task completion with 95%+ success rate.

financeManagement.title: Enterprise-Grade Secure Deployment
financeManagement.description: Support private deployment, hybrid cloud deployment, and SaaS service modes. Complete permission system and audit mechanisms meet enterprise data security and compliance requirements, ensuring business data safety.

footer.companyDescription: TeGo-OS — Enterprise Digital Avatar & AI Super Team Platform

framework.title: Self-developed MCP Framework
framework.description: Based on proprietary MCP framework, using @Tool decorators to quickly define agent tools, significantly improving development efficiency.

standardization.title: Standardized Tool Registration & Auto Validation
standardization.description: Support automatic metadata declaration and structured registration of tool capabilities, automatic parameter validation and type checking.

simplification.title: Define Intelligent Services in Few Lines
simplification.description: Minimal development process, define an invocable intelligent service with just a few lines of code, rapid deployment and iteration.

multiAgent.title: Multi-Agent Collaboration (LAMP Framework)
multiAgent.description: Patented Technology: Language-enhanced multi-agent collaborative decision system featuring Think-Speak-Decide three-stage reasoning pipeline. Enables semantic communication between agents, continuous reasoning analysis, and multi-source information fusion for intelligent decisions. Supports DAG concurrent scheduling and dynamic replanning, achieving 15-25% improvement in task success rate and 2-5x performance boost.

summary.content: Decorator-driven development model allows developers to focus on business logic without worrying about tedious details like tool registration and validation. Declarative development approach greatly improves development efficiency and code maintainability, reducing technical barriers and delivery costs.

tegoOS.title: TeGo AI Super Team
tegoOS.subtitle: Build an Untiring AI Super Team to Autonomously Complete Complex Business Tasks

problem.title: Four Major Challenges in Enterprise AI Applications
problem.description: Agent silos, fragmented capabilities, lack of governance, efficiency bottlenecks—data isolated between different AI tools unable to collaborate, broken processes requiring manual assembly, lacking unified permissions and audits, serial execution with low efficiency. Enterprises urgently need a solution that enables true AI collaboration.

mission.title: TeGo's Solution
mission.description: Build AI Super Team: Enable multiple agents to think autonomously, collaborate intelligently, and execute concurrently like a real team. Based on LAMP collaboration framework and DAG concurrent scheduling engine, break down AI tool barriers, achieve unified management, intelligent collaboration, and continuous evolution. From agent silos to super teams.

Belief state management and trust updating

decide.title: Decide - Decision Fusion
decide.description: Adaptive intelligent decision-making through multi-source information fusion, combining numerical data, reasoning results, and belief states
features: Weighted scoring and LLM-based decision making

dag.title: DAG Concurrent Scheduling Engine
dag.subtitle: Intelligent task scheduling based on directed acyclic graphs, automatically analyzing dependencies to maximize parallel execution efficiency

topology.title: Topological Sorting
topology.description: Automatically analyze task dependencies, build execution topology, determine optimal execution order

parallel.title: Parallel Execution
parallel.description: Launch independent tasks simultaneously, transform serial to concurrent, dramatically reduce completion time

dynamic.title: Dynamic Adjustment
dynamic.description: Runtime dynamic concurrency adjustment, intelligent optimization based on resource status and task characteristics

isolation.title: Exception Isolation
isolation.description: Single task exceptions don't affect other tasks, ensuring overall process stability

experience.title: Experience Pool Continuous Learning
experience.subtitle: Vector storage of historical successful experiences, intelligent retrieval and reuse of best strategies, getting smarter over time

vector.title: Vector Storage
vector.description: Convert successful execution trajectories into vector representations, efficiently stored in experience pool

retrieval.title: Intelligent Retrieval
retrieval.description: New tasks automatically retrieve similar historical experiences, quickly match best strategies

reuse.title: Strategy Reuse
reuse.description: Reuse historical successful strategies, reducing planning time by 40-60%

evolution.title: Continuous Evolution
evolution.description: Failed cases serve as counter-examples to avoid mistakes, system continuously optimizes

a2ui.title: A2UI Dynamic Interface Engine
a2ui.description: Dynamic interface rendering engine based on Google A2UI protocol. AI no longer just outputs text, but directly generates interactive interface components - charts, forms, buttons, what you see is what you get. We led Google's official release by implementing the first complete React renderer.
features: Full implementation of A2UI protocol specification
15+ standard components (Text, Card, Chart, Form, etc.)
Independent style system, zero Tailwind dependency
Declarative data format, no code injection risk
Support for streaming rendering and real-time updates

demo.title: Interactive Output Example
demo.input: User: Analyze sales data and find the best performing regions

skills.title: Agent Skills Ecosystem
skills.description: Extend AI capabilities like installing apps. Standardized skill definition specification, compatible with Claude Agent Skills open standard, cross-platform usable. Supports Cowork collaboration mode for dynamic multi-skill combination without predefined workflows.
features: Cowork collaboration mode, intelligent multi-skill orchestration

example.title: Skill Definition Example
example.desc: Professional legal contract review and risk analysis

painPoints.title: Does Your AI Struggle with These Too?
painPoints.subtitle: Three Critical Challenges in Enterprise AI

island.title: Agent Silos
island.description: Different AI tools work in isolation — data fragmented, workflows broken, requiring manual effort to bridge gaps between tools.

unmanaged.title: Uncontrolled Capabilities
unmanaged.description: What is AI doing? Is it correct? Who can use it? Who's responsible? — No unified governance, audit, or permission control.

inefficient.title: Efficiency Ceiling
inefficient.description: Sequential execution, single-point intelligence, no collaboration, no concurrency, no learning — complex tasks still heavily depend on manual work.

productOverview.title: From "Single-Point AI Tools" to "Enterprise AI Productivity Platform"
productOverview.description: Traditional AI tools address local efficiency, but enterprises need intelligent infrastructure that evolves long-term.
productOverview.highlight: TeGo-OS puts digital avatars at its core, unifying smart orchestration, tools, knowledge, permissions, and audit on a single platform — enabling AI to not just answer questions, but to execute tasks, collaborate on decisions, and accumulate experience as "digital employees" on behalf of the organization.
